title: play button doesn't work
body: anyone one having the same issue with the alpha client where the play button isn't functioning?

replies.body: We  know about this problem and it is high in our priorities, we'll get it fixed ASAP. Sorry for the inconvenience!
4 months ago it's high on priorities, still haven't fixed it yet. Gj rito {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I press play button and nothing happens.
I have the same issue too.
